trends: There has been one other sighting in Bright
There were no other sightings in Bright on or around October 14th 2008
Summary: triangle with 5 lights behind it hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on state line road in indiana coming home from work when i saw this thing! i slowed my car down to make sure i knew what i was looking at. It looked like a big silver square i could see the heat coming off of the exhaust or what ever was holding it in the air. After i passed this i headed up te hill to my house and got a shower to head over my girlfriends house. I headed back down the road i came up toward her house. when i got to the bottom of state line road it was still there! but much higher in the air and it still had that exhaust heat stream from the bottom. i slowed down again to make sure what i was looking at. i pulled over with 3 or 4 cars and watched this thing go higher and higher up in the sky . whatever it was it didnt care we were watching. Hope ypu guys can figure ths out it was weird. this is awesome i never belived in this [pd].
